wallet.title: Wallet Management
wallet.noAccountsWarning: No withdrawal addresses, please add a withdrawal address first
wallet.loadWalletFailedRetry: Failed to load wallet information, please retry
wallet.loadChangesFailedRetry: Failed to load transaction records, please retry
wallet.loadWithdrawsFailedRetry: Failed to load withdrawal records, please retry
wallet.withdrawDescription: Enter withdrawal amount and select withdrawal account
wallet.noWithdrawAccounts: No withdrawal accounts, please add one first
wallet.withdrawRemarkPlaceholder: Optional, note withdrawal purpose or other remarks
wallet.withdrawFeeNotice: Withdrawal fees will be deducted from the withdrawal amount. Actual amount received is subject to blockchain transfer
wallet.confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete this withdrawal account?
wallet.changesDescription: View all income, withdrawal and refund records
wallet.withdrawsDescription: Manage and track all withdrawal request statuses
wallet.accountsDescription: Configure withdrawal account addresses and network settings
wallet.accountSecurityDescription: Please ensure the withdrawal address is accurate. Once submitted, funds cannot be recovered. We recommend testing with a small amount first.
wallet.noAccountsDescription: Add your first withdrawal account to start managing your funds.
wallet.addAccountDescription: Select withdrawal method and enter payment information. Supports cryptocurrency wallets and PayPal.
wallet.paypalGuide: Enter your PayPal account email. Withdrawals will be sent to your PayPal account in US dollars (USD). PayPal fees are approximately 3%.
wallet.currencyGuide: Both USDT and USDC are stablecoins pegged 1:1 to the US dollar. If you're unsure which to choose, we recommend USDT as it's currently the most widely used stablecoin.
